insert.selectKey: select count(1) from E_LIC_CERTIFICATE where licid = #{licid}
insert.if: insert into E_LIC_CERTIFICATE ( licid, pripid, licno, licname, valfrom, valto, licanth, s_ext_fromnode, s_ext_datatime ) values ( #{licid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pripid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{valfrom, jdbcType=DATE}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), to_date(#{valto, jdbcType=DATE}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{licanth, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 440300, SYSDATE )
